template.description: basic structure for a douidefinition.xml file
template.name: douidefinition.xml

template.description: douidefinition.xml file for a CONTENT type service
template.name: douidefinition.xml - CONTENT

template.description: servicedefinition.xml file for a CONTENT type service
template.name: servicedefinition.xml - CONTENT

templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <serviceDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.lumis.com.br/lumisportal/xsd/servicedefinition.xsd"> <service name="" type="lum_content"> </service>
<interfaces> <!-- end-user interfaces --> <interface name="STR_QUICK_LIST" id="quicklist" type="lum_contentQuickList" /> <interface name="STR_LIST" id="list" type="lum_contentList" /> <interface name="STR_DETAILS" id="details" type="lum_contentDetails" />
<!-- administration interfaces --> <interface name="STR_ADMINISTRATION" id="administration" type="lum_contentAdministrationList" /> <interface name="STR_ADD" id="add" type="lum_contentAdministrationAddPropertyPage" /> <interface name="STR_EDIT" id="edit" type="lum_contentAdministrationEditPropertyPage" /> </interfaces> </serviceDefinition>

template.description: servicedefinition.xml file for a DOUI type service
template.name: servicedefinition.xml - DOUI

templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <serviceDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.lumis.com.br/lumisportal/xsd/servicedefinition.xsd"> <service name="" type="lum_doui"> </service>
<interfaces> <!-- end-user interfaces --> <interface name="STR_QUICK_LIST" id="quicklist" type="lum_douiQuickList" /> <interface name="STR_LIST" id="list" type="lum_douiList" /> <interface name="STR_DETAILS" id="details" type="lum_douiDetails" />
<!-- administration interfaces --> <interface name="STR_ADMINISTRATION" id="administration" type="lum_douiAdministrationList" /> <interface name="STR_ADD" id="add" type="lum_douiAdministrationAddPropertyPage" /> <interface name="STR_EDIT" id="edit" type="lum_douiAdministrationEditPropertyPage" /> </interfaces> </serviceDefinition>
